response.original_title: Bryan Nickel's Hydroplate Theory Origin of the Grand Canyon
response.overview: Bryan Nickel, a mechanical engineer in the aerospace industry, produced and narrates this in-depth explanation of Dr. Walt Brown's Hydroplate Theory for the origin of one of the seven wonders of the world. Just as his "HPT Tutorial" series dealt with the globe and the solar system, Nickel's current video explains the initial conditions and the mechanisms that led to the formation of the Grand Canyon.
response.title: Bryan Nickel's Hydroplate Theory Origin of the Grand Canyon
